name: The Stranger: Interactive Game
detailed_description:
- You decide the course of story!
- Interactive film game
- Relive the classic B-Movie style in a Psychological Thriller key!
- Multiple story endings that will depend on your choices

Make the decisions, the protagonist of the story is you!
Decide whether to go in one direction or another, whether to attack or flee, whether to resort to weapons or not!

short_description: The Story: Your wife died in a boat accident. After the funeral for months you have been away from everyone and everything. You have retired to a farm in the middle of nowhere. But maybe.. you're not alone.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
The game is like a psychological horror thriller composed of real cutscenes.
There are violent scenes, such as the presence of various weapons, special sounds etc.
Therefore it is recommended for an audience aged 17+
